actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A concurrent resolution urging the President, in negotiating bilateral textile and apparel agreements, to utilize fully existing authority to limit the growth of foreign shares in the United States market.

summary.text: Urges the President to use existing authority under the Arrangement regarding Trade in Textiles to negotiate bilateral agreements to lower the rate at which the foreign share of the U.S. textile and apparel market is growing.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution urging the President, in negotiating bilateral textile and apparel agreements, to utilize fully existing authority to limit the growth of foreign shares in the United States market.
